name: Fields of Fire: War Along the Mohawk
name_original: Fields of Fire: War Along the Mohawk
description:
Fields of Fire: War Along the Mohawk is a RPG-strategy game developed by Empire Interactive Entertainment. It came out on 01-01-1998. It was published by Empire Interactive Entertainment. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Fields of Fire: War Along the Mohawk is available on PC.
